Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka has lost three straight games in the tournament.
Netherlands registered their first win after defeating South Africa.
The Netherlands have emerged as one of the biggest surprise teams in the tournament with great cricket played by Scott Edwards, Logan van Beek, Roelof van der Merwe, and Aryan Dutt.
Sri Lanka has shown flashes of brilliance but has lacked consistency in batting and has severely lacked control in bowling.
